pullrequest.title: Fix timeout for speed regression test

content.raw: This patch skips waiting for `HasEntity` to return true, but seems like the underlying spawn mechanism has changed, causing the spawn behavior to be slower than before.  Is the change introducing a new spawning inefficiency or is it patching something else that introduced this trade-off?
content.html: This patch skips waiting for HasEntity to return true, but seems like the underlying spawn mechanism has changed, causing the spawn behavior to be slower than before. Is the change introducing a new spawning inefficiency or is it patching something else that introduced this trade-off?
